## ContentView.bind() method

Binds a view's behaviors to its binding source.

**Signature:**

```typescript
bind(source: any, context?: ExecutionContext): void;
```

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

source


</td><td>

any


</td><td>

The binding source for the view's binding behaviors.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

context


</td><td>

[ExecutionContext](../fast-element.executioncontext/)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The execution context to run the view within.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
